categories: Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Unidentified Rebel Alliance–affiliated individual

An individual who was a Jedi during the end of the Galactic Republic helped the Rebel Alliance during the Galactic Civil War. The individual was usually equipped with either a lightsaber or a blaster, and was tempted by both the Dark side of the Force and the Light side of the Force.
History
Old Republic
The individual was a Jedi and was asked by Yoda to go to Naboo to help Qui-Gon Jinn stop a Sith. He then fought in the Invasion of Naboo, and dueled B1-Series battle droids and Darth Maul.
The individual also fought battle droid troop formations accompanied by Nute Gunray and his co-leaders during the Battle of the Great Grass Plains.

Jedi Master Mace Windu asked the individual to assist Obi-Wan Kenobi on Kamino, where there was a swarm of B1 battle droids. The two Jedi also engaged in a duel with Jango Fett. Windu also asked the individual to assist Yoda in stopping a conspiracy on Geonosis. The individual then fought more B1 droids.

During the Separatist Crisis, the individual assisted Windu's strike team as they fought in the Petranaki arena. The individual fought swarms of battle droids. The battle then spilled out away from the arena.
The individual assisted Yoda in fighting Count Dooku. Following the battle, Windu told him to report to the Jedi High Council, and then have the opportunity for rest.
The individual was called out to Felucia to assist the Jedi as they fought Separatist battle droid forces as the Clone Wars continued.

Later, Yoda told him that he felt a sense of pain and anger on Mustafar and told him to assist Kenobi. There the individual cut down multiple battle droids. There he helped Kenobi duel Skywalker. Afterward, Yoda told him that the Sith had not been annihilated, only pushed back. He told the individual to keep training and wait until the time comes, and that he would meditate.
Rebellion

The individual at one time helped the Rebel Alliance during the Galactic Civil War and was aboard the CR90 corvette Tantive IV when it was attacked by the Galactic Empire. Leia Organa asked the individual to help them. The individual used their weapon to defeat stormtroopers. Afterward, the individual was tempted by the Light side of the Force and the Dark side of the Force.
The individual also helped the Alliance capture the test unit Death Star, which subsequently was self-destructed.

The individual also served in the defense of Echo Base on Hoth, as well as in the ground assault on the Death Star II's shield generator bunker on Endor. The individual used their weapon against attacking creatures, troopers, and droids.
The individual also helped the Rebel Alliance on Tatooine and Endor. On Tatooine, he assisted Luke Skywalker in a fight with Boba Fett. On Endor, he fought Darth Vader with Yoda.
Behind the scenes

The player interacts through the individual during the quest portion of the 2013 card game app Star Wars: Force Collection. The boarding of the Tantive IV serves as the tutorial, and then the player has the option of choosing the light side or the dark side. A "leader card" could be set, which determines the weapon type and color used during the in-game quests, including a lightsaber or a blaster.
2013 events

The Light Side won the Death Star Event, so this article incorporates the individual's presence during the event. The October "Geonosis Battle Arena" Event established that the individual was a Jedi, and that there were random encounters with Jango Fett, Yoda, and Mace Windu. The Events are optional, although this article assumes the player took part in them.

In November, there as a mini-Event where the player encountered all of the various planet bosses. Additionally, the Arena Event was expanded in November to include the full part of the Battle of Geonosis. In December 2013, the "Operation Hoth Defensive" was launched, focusing on the Battle of Hoth, and put players as members of the Alliance.
2014 events

In January 2014, the "Invasion of Naboo" event focused on the Battle of the Great Grass Plains during the namesake event; as players' alignment with the Jedi or the Trade Federation was determined by their Light Side or Dark Side alignment, the article assumes the player is playing on the Light Side of the Force. In February, "Endor Ambush" focused on the Battle of Endor's ground assault and was similar to "Operation Hoth Defensive".

The month of March featured the first "Tatooine Bounty Hunt" event, where players were contacted by Jabba the Hutt during quests to search for and defeat five bounty targets, represented by other players, in formation battles. The "Battle of Felucia" and "Battle of Mygeeto" were the focuses of further events during March 2014 and July 2014; the player's alignment again determined whether they assisted the Jedi and the Republic, or the Separatists.

The month of April featured the "Rise of the Death Star", an event similar to Tatooine Bounty Hunt, where players were contacted by Darth Vader during quests to defeat five target Rebel cargo ships to take back resources toward the second Death Star's construction. This event ended with 91% resources gathered by participants.
Appearances
